kurt cobain

American singer, songwriter, and musician, best known as the guitarist and frontman of the rock band Nirvana. He is remembered as one of the most iconic and influential rock musicians in the history of alternative music.

01
kurt cobain's life

biography

1967

Cobain was born in Aberdeen, Washington, a small, isolated town a hundred or so miles south of Seattle. His parents divorced when he was eight. The consequences of the parental split appear to have been disastrous.

1985

In early groups, Cobain’s songwriting displayed early signs of the Nirvana sound. Kurt met Krist Novoselic, a bass player, and the pair worked through various drummers before eventually finding David Grohl.

1989

Nirvana, as they had become known, made their first record, at the Seattle studio. The trio were regularly playing throughout the American northwest. Nirvana broadened their market, touring the United States

1991

Nirvana signed with Geffen Records and that year, Nevermind was released. By November, Nevermind was in the US Top Ten. The single “Smells Like Teen Spirit” was on heavy rotation on MTV in the US and Europe.

1992

In February 1992, Cobain married Courtney Love. After Cobain and his wife revealed, that they had both continued a using heroin during Love’s pregnancy, they seemed mystified at the hostile reader response.

1993

The release of the second album, In Utero, was another big success. Kurt Cobain had seemed to finally find peace within himself. He insisted that his heroin addiction was over. Even the stomach pains had ended.

1994

Kurt Cobain went into a semi-coma in a hotel in Rome, the consequence of a combination of champagne and painkillers. This was only a temporary lapse. He was found dead in his home in Seattle a few weeks later.
